findings.liver: Normal in signal intensity, without concerning focal liver lesions.

liver.lesion: 15 x 10 mm T2 hyperintense lesion consistent with biliary hamartoma.
liver.dilation: Mild intra and extra hepatic biliary dilatation, with CBD measuring 7 mm.

pancreas.signal: Diffusely low signal on the pre-contrast T1-weighted images.
pancreas.restricted_diffusion: Restricted diffusion seen within the pancreatic head and neck.
pancreas.lobulation: Focal lobulation of pancreas, insinuating between the first and second portion of duodenum.
pancreas.duct: Main pancreatic duct mildly dilated measuring 4 mm.

duodenum.wall_edema: Marked duodenal wall edema involving the first and second portions.
duodenum.inflammation: Soft tissue inflammation seen along the medial and lateral aspects.

findings.reactive_lymph_nodes: Few reactive lymph nodes seen in the porta hepatis.

adrenal.nodule: 12-mm left adrenal nodule consistent with an adrenal adenoma.

findings.spleen: Normal size with a small contour abnormality consistent with an old infarct.
